head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CONNER, FOX BRANDRETH

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CONNER, FOX BRANDRETH

block.p: CONNER-Fox Brandreth, 95, of Ossining, N.Y., on July 17. Son of Major General Fox Conner and Virginia Brandreth. Husband of Muriel Macpherson who died in 1986. Graduate of West point, 1927. President of Allcock Manufacturing Company, manufacturer of Havahart humane animal traps. Survived by two sons, Fox of Granada Hills, Calif., and Macpherson of Walker Valley, N.Y.; a son-inlaw, Norman T. MacDonald of Bronxville, N.Y.; ten grandchildren, and nine great-grandchildren. Predeceased by a daughter, Sue MacDonald, and two sisters, Florence Gans and Betty Vida. Memorial service at Waterbury & Kelly Funeral Home, 1300 Pleasantville Rd., Briarcliff Manor, NY on Saturday July 22, 2000 at 11:00am. Donations can be made to the Ossining Historical Society, 196 Croton Avenue, Ossining, NY 10562
